snippet.title: Best iOS apps
snippet.description: With an ever-growing selection in the App Store, it can be near impossible to cut through all the cl

snippet.title: ZTE Warp 4G
snippet.description: At $199 sans contract, the ZTE Warp 4G is the best choice for frugal shoppers on Boost Mobile.

snippet.title: ZTE Reef
snippet.description: The ZTE Reef stands out for its water-resistant skin, but skip to Virgin's other smartphones if you care more about getting the latest features and top-of-the-line performance.

snippet.title: Sony Xperia Z1 Compact
snippet.description: With its powerful processor, great camera, decent screen and gorgeous, waterproof design, the Sony Xperia Z1 Compact is the best small Android phone around.

snippet.title: Correction: Best Buy Windows Store
snippet.description: The story incorrectly described the status of the new Windows Store within a Best Buy store in Los Angeles. It is not the first Best Buy Windows Store.

snippet.title: Pebble Steel
snippet.description: Equal parts fashionable and functional, the Pebble Steel leaps to the top of the smartwatch heap, but does so by improving existing tech rather than adding something totally new.

snippet.title: Best Buy to open Windows Store in LA today
snippet.description: The latest Windows store-within-a-store is opening Wednesday, August 7, at the West LA branch of the big-box retailer.

snippet.title: Best Buy sale trims price on cellular iPads
snippet.description: Good through Saturday, a new Best Buy sale cuts the price, and potentially the subscription costs, of a cellular iPad.

snippet.title: Correction: Samsung mini stores at Best Buy
snippet.description: This story originally misstated the extent of Samsung's "store in store" presence in the US. Samsung began setting up mini stores at Best Buy sites in spring 2013.

snippet.title: Kindle for iOS
snippet.description: Kindle for iOS is a rock-solid e-reader for anyone already invested in Amazon's ecosystem, but it's harder to browse and buy books than it is with the native iBooks app.
